value.name: Mandatory vaccination: One in three bosses want compulsory COVID jab for all staff
value.description: As the COVID-19 vaccine program rolls out, some employers are exploring their options to have all staff vaccinated. ONE in three Australian employers hope to make COVID-19 vaccination compulsory for their workers.

video.name: Third of bosses want mandatory vaccine
